description.value: You bellow grateful prayers to Father Bear, as you bless and devour your most recent prey in his name, leaving only bones. A single deceased non-mutated animal of Size Little or larger is the target of the spell. The animal must have died within the past hour. You heal for half the animal’s total Wounds to a minimum of 1 and remove all @Condition[Fatigued] Conditions. If more than one person consumes the animal, the Wounds are equally devided amongst all participants in the food offering, rounded down. This Miracle is slow, with the effects taking time depending on the creature’s size before they manifest: Little creatures take 1 minute to consume, Small are 10 minutes, Average are 20 minutes, Large take 1 hour and Enormous creatures take 2+ hours. If interrupted, the Miracle will need to be attempted again until the carcass is fully consumed.
